items.question: What's the RSVP deadline?
items.answer: Please confirm your attendance before {{rsvpDeadline}} so we can get an exact count. It helps us immensely with the planning! ðŸ˜Š
items.notEnabled: You will be able to RSVP via the website shortly!

items.question: Where is the ceremony and party?
items.answer: Everything will take place at starting at {{ceremonyTime}} until midnight.

items.question: What's the weather like?
items.answer: July is usually sunny and warm, often hotter than in the UK. <WeatherForecast/>

items.question: Is there a shuttle bus?
items.answer: Yes! A bus will depart at {{busToVenue.time}} from the main meeting point. There will be a return bus at {{busFromVenue.time}}.

items.question: Are children invited?
items.answer: We love your little ones, but we have decided to make our wedding an adults-only event. We hope you can enjoy a night off to celebrate with us!

items.question: What is the Dress Code?
items.answer: Formal / Cocktail attire. Please avoid wearing white or ivory. Since it is {{weddingDate.month}} in Spain, we recommend light fabrics and breathable materials to stay cool.

items.question: Is there a Registry or Gift list?
items.answer: Your presence is the greatest gift of all. However, if you wish to honor us with a gift, a contribution toward our honeymoon fund would be greatly appreciated.

items.question: Outdoor or indoor?
items.answer: Both! We will have an outdoor ceremony, followed by cocktails on the terrace and an indoor dinner at {{ceremonyVenue}}. Sunscreen and hats are recommended for those not used to Spain's July sun.

items.question: What shoes should I wear?
items.answer: The ceremony is on grass, so we recommend avoiding thin stilettos. Wedges, block heels, or fancy flats will be much more comfortable for dancing!

items.question: Do you have special meal options?
items.answer: Of course! When you RSVP, please let us know if you are vegan, gluten-free, have severe allergies, or dietary restrictions so the catering team can prepare accordingly.

items.question: Can I take photos?
items.answer: We invite you to be fully present during our ceremony and ask that you keep your phones away. During the party, please take as many photos as you like! ðŸ“¸

items.question: Last minute questions?
items.answer:
If you have any questions, you can send us a whatsapp message and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

items.question: Where should I stay?
items.answer: For your convenience, we've compiled a list of recommended hotels near the bus pick up point or alternatively check out <AirBnbLink/>. <HotelLinks/> We suggest booking early, especially for guests coming from the UK.
